BlueHQ

• Customized Tableau-based reports

• Automated data syncs from any online data platform, including Google Sheets

• App for uploading and matching new data using BlueLabs’ proprietary algorithm

• App for downloading existing data for deeper analysis and modeling

• Strong security and privacy protections

• Access to premium apps, including the upX media planning engine

CONTACT US

{BlueHQ}

BlueHQ is an online reporting platform designed to provide executives, department heads, and analysts with the information they need to make better strategic and tactical decisions.

Designed for leaders who are tired of having disconnected internal data platforms, BlueHQ helps organizations become more successful by using their granular data to fuel major improvements in effectiveness and efficiency.

Using the state-of-the-art data architecture we’ve pioneered in politics, government, and business, BlueHQ delivers real-time, dynamic, and compelling reports customized to an organization’s needs. With apps designed specifically for marketing managers and in-house analysts, BlueHQ packs the power to truly transform your programs.

Use Cases

• Monitor trends to see how many supporters become activist
• See how many donations come in through Facebook compared to mail, email, and YouTube.

BlueHQ provides real-time reports that display this information, including underlying demographic trends. Using the data, the nonprofit can make significant strategic investments. BlueLabs also delivers a list of the best Facebook donor acquisition prospects that can improve performance.

Learn More

A PAC wants to know in real time how many doors were knocked on by partner groups in Florida, how many led to conversations, and how those numbers match up against the goals for each group.

BlueHQ provides a statewide FL report, as well as reports dedicated to each partner group down to the individual volunteer, helping the PAC ensure that partners are meeting their goals and identify any worrying signs in time for strategic, mid-course corrections.

A car brand wants to identify the optimal stock levels for different models across its dealerships, as well as local successes that can can be replicated across other dealerships.

BlueHQ helps the brand see what is happening nationally, with the ability to zoom in to specific geographies, dealerships, and models. Its marketing team uses this intelligence to plan media buys with BlueHQ’s media planning app.

Intrigued? Find out more about how we are revolutionizing data-driven decision making.
